keyMoments.title: Nami Tricks the Weatheria Scholars
keyMoments.description: Nami uses manipulation and a fake suicide threat to convince the Weatheria scholars to let her stay and learn their weather science.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's cunning and determination to become stronger for her crew.
keyMoments.quote: I need to learn everything about weather from you. Please teach me!

keyMoments.title: Remembers Luffy's Support Against Arlong
keyMoments.description: Nami recalls when Luffy helped her break free from Arlong's oppression.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Nami's motivation to become stronger to support Luffy's dream.

keyMoments.title: Begins Training with Haredas
keyMoments.description: Haredas agrees to teach Nami everything about weather science and Weather Ball technology.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Nami's two-year training in advanced weather manipulation.

relationships.description: Haredas agrees to teach Nami advanced weather science during the two-year timeskip.

evolutionMoments.description: Haredas agrees to train Nami after she explains her need to become stronger for her crew.

reveals.information: Begins two-year training in advanced weather science on Weatheria

keyMoments.title: Learns About Attack Cuisine
keyMoments.description: Emporio Ivankov explains Attack Cuisine - a special cooking that makes people's bodies stronger and hearts purer, with 99 recipes held by the 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique power-up system tied to cooking, perfectly suited to Sanji's role as the crew's chef.

keyMoments.title: Accepts Ivankov's Challenge
keyMoments.description: Ivankov challenges Sanji to defeat all 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo to earn the Attack Cuisine recipes, while avoiding being turned into an okama.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the terms of Sanji's training for the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Begins Training Against 99 Masters
keyMoments.description: Sanji accepts the challenge and begins his desperate fight against the 99 masters, vowing to get stronger for Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Sanji's grueling training that will teach him Sky Walk, enhanced combat abilities, and Attack Cuisine recipes.

relationships.description: Ivankov challenges Sanji to earn Attack Cuisine recipes by defeating the 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo.

evolutionMoments.description: Ivankov sets up the challenge for Sanji to earn Attack Cuisine knowledge.

reveals.information: Begins training to defeat 99 masters of New Kama Kenpo to learn Attack Cuisine recipes
Will learn Attack Cuisine - special cooking that makes people stronger

keyMoments.title: Discovers Vegapunk's Hidden Laboratory
keyMoments.description: Franky discovers a second, hidden laboratory belonging to Dr. Vegapunk containing intact blueprints for weapons and Devil Fruit research.
keyMoments.significance: Provides Franky access to the world's most advanced scientific knowledge for upgrading himself and the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.quote: This is... another lab! And all these blueprints... Vegapunk's research!

keyMoments.title: Commits to Studying Vegapunk's Technology
keyMoments.description: Franky decides to stay in the hidden laboratory to study Vegapunk's blueprints, vowing to make the Thousand Sunny the ship of dreams.
keyMoments.significance: Sets Franky on the path to gaining knowledge for revolutionary upgrades to himself and the crew's ship.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to get stronger! I'll make the Sunny into the ship of dreams!

reveals.information: Begins studying Dr. Vegapunk's advanced technology and blueprints on Karakuri Island
Discovers Vegapunk's hidden laboratory on Karakuri Island

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Explains Attack Cuisine to Sanji
keyMoments.description: Ivankov reveals the existence of Attack Cuisine and its properties to Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique culinary power system to the series.
keyMoments.quote: Attack Cuisine is a dish that makes peoples' bodies stronger and hearts purer!

keyMoments.title: Challenges Sanji to Defeat 99 Masters
keyMoments.description: Ivankov sets up the challenge for Sanji to earn the Attack Cuisine recipes.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the framework for Sanji's two-year training.

keyMoments.title: Agrees to Train Nami
keyMoments.description: After understanding Nami's dedication to her crew, Haredas agrees to teach her everything about weather science.
keyMoments.significance: Becomes Nami's mentor for the two-year timeskip training period.

relationships.description: Haredas becomes Nami's teacher in advanced weather science.

evolutionMoments.description: Haredas agrees to teach Nami about weather navigation and Weather Ball technology.

reveals.information: Born on sky island Birka 97 years ago, played a role in constructing Weatheria 67 years ago
